Package FBLAQuiz

Interface Question

All Known Implementing Classes:
FillInBlank, Matching, MCQ, MultipleSelect, TrueOrFalse
public interface Question
An interface to define the shared methods of the different question types and classes.
Author:
Varun Unnithan

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    javax.swing.JPanel createPanel​(int questionNumber, javax.swing.JFrame frame)
    Creates a JPanel which includes UI components to add to the JFrame in order to ask the current question
    java.lang.String getQuestion()
    Gets the question String for this question
    int getQuizQuestionNumber()
    Get's this question's number within the quiz
    boolean isAnswered()
    Checks to see if a question is answered
    boolean isCorrect()
    Checks to see if the user's answer matches the correct answer
    boolean isFlagged()
    Checks to see if a question is flagged

  • Method Details

    • getQuestion

      java.lang.String getQuestion()
      Gets the question String for this question
      Returns:
      The question as a String

    • isFlagged

      boolean isFlagged()
      Checks to see if a question is flagged
      Returns:
      true if a question is flagged

    • getQuizQuestionNumber

      int getQuizQuestionNumber()
      Get's this question's number within the quiz
      Returns:
      The question number of this question in the quiz

    • isAnswered

      boolean isAnswered()
      Checks to see if a question is answered
      Returns:
      true if a question is answered

    • isCorrect

      boolean isCorrect()
      Checks to see if the user's answer matches the correct answer
      Returns:
      true if the user correctly answered the question

    • createPanel

      javax.swing.JPanel createPanel​(int questionNumber, javax.swing.JFrame frame)
      Creates a JPanel which includes UI components to add to the JFrame in order to ask the current question
      Parameters:
      questionNumber - The question's number within the quiz
      frame - The JFrame upon which this JPanel will be added
      Returns:
      JPanel object to be added to the JFrame which includes this question
